title: President Trump Takes Action to Get Washington Out of the Way â€“ The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Budget & Spending	

Issued on:
March 27, 2017
Any regulation that is outdated, unnecessary, bad for workers, or contrary to the national interest will be scrapped.
						Donald J. Trump					YEARS OF GOVERNMENT OVERREACH: President Donald J. Trump has inherited the bloated regulatory regime of the past Administration.GETTING GOVERNMENT OUT OF THE WAY: Today, President Trump signed legislation to help eliminate unnecessary, harmful, and job-killing regulations.CUTTING RED TAPE ACROSS THE GOVERNMENT: President Trump has signed Executive Orders and legislation to cut regulations that get in the way of Americans.KEEPING HIS PROMISES TO THE AMERICAN PEOPLE: President Donald J. Trump has promised the country he would cut needless regulation.
